item.title: Massive help - someone please!
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

I’m currently useing Project Insanity, if you don’t know leave now.

I have 5 stalls at home giving:

Choclate Cake
Silk
Ring
Silver Dust
Red Topaz

How can I change what you get from the stalls.

I’ve tryed zfilesearcher and i’ve tryed searching in client.java - if (c.getItems().addItem(id,1)) {

This is whats in theiveing:

if (c.playerLevel[c.playerThieving] >= level) {
if (c.getItems().addItem(id,1)) {
c.startAnimation(832);
c.getPA().addSkillXP(xp * Config.THIEVING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerThieving);
c.lastThieve = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.sendMessage("You steal a " + server.model.items.Item.getItemName(id) + “.”);
}

If you can help me that would mean so much to me!, i’ve been looking everywhere and I guess this is my last option.

Regards,

James

Read full topic
